top_comments_top.body: ?? It was a flavor of the month game, what are you on about. It was bound to die, bad memes had nothing to do with it
Among us was a fad just like every other game like it. It’s fall guys. It’s animal crossing. We played it. We liked it. We moved on. It’s not a bad thing.

***A m o o g u s.***

>!Implying the shitty memes weren't the only thing keeping it relevant, and that it's temporary success wasn't only due to streamer boredom and that it's lifespan wasn't inherently limited in the first place.!<
It’s a party game you’ll play with friends every now and then. Randoms suck to bad to play all the time and it’s to simple to have a huge skill gap like a competitive game
I played it once I thought it was dumb
